channel.title: Sick Music Sharing Site
channel.description:
Alright, this site ive been using for awhile now, and i find it pretty good. You can search for all the new hip hop, R&B and Rap Releases and it will have it. You can listen or download, but to listen you need a Quicktime plugin (comes with iTunes Download)
Link: http://www.hotnewhiphop.com/en/home/
